title: Cubs_Account doesn't exist in PV
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: Sign Up Form + Do not send Verification Email > Landing Page

title: Cubs_Verify the account exists in PV
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: Should never happen. Log BO bug. Error out.

title: Cubs_Account NOT exist in PV
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Sign Up Form + Send Verification Email (Create end-point) > Pop up message

title: Cubs_Account exists in PV & NOT Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Pop up message + Button to send Verification Email (It will also link BO)

title: Cubs_ Account exists in PV & NOT Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Sign Up Form + Send Verification Email (Create end-point) > Pop up message

title: Cubs_Account is having  Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: User taken to the Landing page

title: Cubs_Account is NOT Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: Sign Up Form + Do not send Verification Email > Landing Page

title: Cubs_Account is  Entitled however MLB email not verified
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Pop up message + Button to send Verification Email

title: Cubs_Account is  NOT Entitled however MLB email not verified
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Sign Up Form + Send Verification Email (Create end-point) > Pop up message

title: Twins_Account NOT exist in PV
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: "Sorry your account does not have access" (Pop up / Error page)

title: Twins_Account exists in PV
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: Should never happen. Log BO bug. Error out.

title: Twins_Users with NO BO link and NO email verified
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > NOT Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Send Verification Email (Validate end-point) > User verifies > BO Linking is attempted in the back-end

title: Twins_Account is Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: User taken to the Landing page

title: Twins_Account is not Entitled
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > Yes
custom_expected: "Sorry your account does not have access" (Pop up / Error page)

title: Twins_Users with BO link and email not verified
custom_steps: Check BO Linking > Linked > MLB Email verified > No
custom_expected: Pop up message + Button to send Verification Email

title: Cubs_When user is not login to mlb.com and try to login to season ticket, it should re-direct to Okta login page
custom_preconds: User should have mlb.com valid log in
custom_steps:
1. user should not be logged in to the mlb.com
2.Once user try to login to season ticketing for cubs, it should takes to the okta login page
custom_expected:
1.User not logged in
2. Okta login page to be displayed

title: Cubs_If user is already login, it should take user to the season ticket dashboard
custom_steps:
User to login to Okta first
Click on the season https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/cubs/tickets/sth

title: Verify when user click on reload page from email verification takes to waiting list dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
<URL> for cubs waiting list
|URL| |https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/cubs/tickets/season-tickets/waiting-list|
AND
User without any MLB login account
custom_steps:
WHEN
User click on sign up to access account
AND
User click on sign up
AND
User fill up required fields
AND
Click Register
AND
User fill out the form
AND 
submit waiting list page
AND
Verify the email
AND
Click on reload
custom_expected:
THEN
User see the cubs login page
AND
User see mlb register page
AND
No errors shows
AND
It take to Cubs form page
AND
No error show
AND
user sees email verification page
AND
Cubs account being created
AND
check in DB for the waring list number in the table `customer_waiting_list`
AND
Waiting list dashboard shows up

title: Verify waiting list get assigned for a user with verified email and no cubs account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
<URL> for cubs waiting list
|URL| |https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/cubs/tickets/season-tickets/waiting-list|
AND
User without any MLB login account
AND
User without Cubs account
custom_steps:
WHEN
User click on sign up to access account
AND
User click on sign up
AND
User fill up required fields
AND
Click Register
AND
AND
Perform an email verification
AND
User fill out the form
AND 
submit waiting list page
AND
Verify  cubs account creation
AND
Waiting list has been created
custom_expected:
THEN
User see the cubs login page
AND
User see mlb register page
AND
No errors shows
AND
It take to Cubs form page
AND
No error show
AND
Waiting list dashboard shows with the details
AND
Cubs account being created
AND 
check in DB for the waring list number in the table `customer_waiting_list`
